SELECT u.id as userId, u.username, u.real_name as nickname, COUNT(l.id) as likeCount, 0 as favoriteCount, COUNT(l.id) as totalInteractions, MAX(l.created_at) as lastActivity, u.create_time as joinTime FROM user u LEFT JOIN resource_like l ON u.id = l.user_id GROUP BY u.id, u.username, u.real_name, u.create_time ORDER BY likeCount DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT r.id as resourceId, r.name as resourceName, 'experiment' as resourceType, COUNT(l.id) as likeCount, 0 as favoriteCount, COUNT(l.id) as totalInteractions, r.category, r.created_at as createTime, MAX(l.created_at) as lastInteraction FROM experiment_project r LEFT JOIN resource_like l ON r.id = l.resource_id GROUP BY r.id, r.name, r.category, r.created_at ORDER BY likeCount DESC LIMIT #{limit}
